title: Entidade Item
example: "Polyester tent for camping that supports up to 6 person"
"Polyester tent for camping that supports up to 6 person"

published.description: Indicates if product is visible in associated channels

caption.example: Polyester tent for camping that supports up to 6 person

allOf.description: Helps you set default price to apply to all Sku's during creation. Property will not persist.

shippable.description: If this item must be shipped

items.title: ItemSku
items.description: Represents a sellable variant of an item. An Sku is what applies pricing to an item.

_id.description: Internal item unique identifier for the Sku. Set to a random uuid if you need to create an item with attributes and list options at once.

alias.description: Define your own Sku code here.

items.title: ItemSkuAttribute
items.description: Specifies a tupple of option id and value to form an Sku's attribute-value pair

attributes.description: A list of attribute-value that characterize this variant Sku

path.description: relative path of this file in CDN

url.description: formated URL of the path pointing to CDN

thumb.description: URL of a 1024x1024 contained image in case the file supports it

size.description: Size in bytes of the file

width.description: The width in pixels in case the file is an image

height.description: The height in pixels in case the file is an image

caption.example: Polyester tent for camping that supports up to 6 person

allOf.description: Represents a recurrence model to the sku.
Additional extenral reference to this sku that might be used to connect external real-time inventory tracking capabilities to this sku

key.description: Identification of this Option. Defaults to a slug of the name

url.description: formated URL of the path pointing to CDN

thumb.description: URL of a 1024x1024 contained image in case the file supports it

height.description: The height in pixels in case the file is an image

formId.description: Id of the form asked to client on the store
